name: Dam We're Stuck Out Here!
description:
You got stranded from your MotherShip on a quick joyride around a nearby planet.

now you've got to get back before you run out of power.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrowkeys

Space shows inside the spaceship

Click on your crew to get help to navigate the depths of space.

**Spoilers**

There is a little confusion on the crews abilities wich I admit are fairly tacked on.

Red creature: shows a navigation arrow for 2seconds and costs 10power to do so.

Centre crew: Give you a message with the remaining power.

Green creature: click and hold- gives speed boost and 2*power-drain.

Game Jam Link

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/$41242

Built for the Ludum Dare #39 Compo 48hr Jam using original scripts assets and music all produced by myself.

see the unity package download for all my source materials and assets
